title: qwerty_asdf
author: qwerty_asdf
content: Hello,I would like to get my hands on a reliable open source market script. I would prefer the market script be similar to Eckmar's Market, where JS isn't required and the script functions with XMR and BTC.I'm not interested in making any purchases, I'm only interested in an open source market script.Thanks

comments.author: qwerty_asdf
comments.body: Appreciated. Is there any big difference between the two repos?
